Title: SPIDER_DIRECT_SQL
Description: A UDF installed with the Spider Storage Engine, this function is used to execute the SQL string sql on the remote server, as defined in parameters. If any resultsets are returned, they are stored in the tmp_table_list.
The function returns 1 if the SQL executes successfully, or 0 if it fails.
Examples: SELECT * FROM dialect_recognize_table WHERE is_endangered = TRUE
